Reviews.Title: “Great service ... And price !”
Reviews.Author: Brian W
Reviews.Content: weekend paris quiet found hotel looking close metro hub service price compared hotels city cheap quality hotel pick lux hotel

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful city, great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Kathi O
Reviews.Content: cousin stayed february nights central connected metro station front door 5minute walk chose range metro lines easily safe girls safe afraid walk zone ourselves night especially bathroom clean prices cheap especially city paris breakfast included expensive eat hotel breakfast buffet impression staff bit cold distant maybe didn´t speak language properly apart french sadly neither able speak ok information able help definitely stay hotel paris

Reviews.Title: “Very good value”
Reviews.Author: collierje
Reviews.Content: hotel value paris picpus metro stop stop m6 line makes convenient city quickly walk day pretty restaurants le nearby dont feel travelling service extraordinary lacking breakfast people morning definitely stay recommend friends family looking economical stay

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: Fortynineplus
Reviews.Content: returned paris staying budget hotel 2 nights chose hotel reading previous reviews disappointed daughter clean twinbed bathroom attached 5th floor staff friendly helpful pleasant stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: Nia01
Reviews.Content: ive stayed lux pic nation hotel 4x starting 2001 2007 staying soon coming march hotel clean bath renovated 2005 nice near nation metro station steps hotel true hear break train 1st floor prefer stay coz love hear sound distance breakfast eat quality considered hotel perfect rate worth budget hotel center prefer safe quiet recommend traveller stay dont expect pillow love hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: Chelsea H
Reviews.Content: stayed night passing paris cant comment convenience major attractions nice short taxi ride gare de lyon reception lift stairs bathrooms hey paris nice views boulevard youre seventh floor lots luggage lift goes 6th overall clean hotel character price

Reviews.Title: “Good location, clean (but small!) rooms”
Reviews.Author: Wilber4orce
Reviews.Content: hotel little removed regular tourist served metro nation picpus 1015 minutes city centre clean comfortable helpful staff local bistros inflated prices tiny shower cubicle resulted wrapped roman senator party stayed floor gentle subterranean rumble passing metro trains noticeable nice breakfast choice buffet dining little crowded recommend looking value budget

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: Misha04
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights impressed excellent value price service helpful friendly reception staff able speak english desk 24 hours clean comfortable bed tv spotless modern onsuite shower location metro station picpus road nation metro 10 minute walk bus stop 50 meters lots restaurants wine shops cheese shops patisseries pub supermarkets short walking distance youd bit paris streets walk de bastille 45 minutes accross little shops street markets marvelous fresh produce antiques items etc try stay paris

Reviews.Title: “What you might expect for the price.”
Reviews.Author: PianoKen
Reviews.Content: ill start saying clean quiet bed location louvre 20 minutes close nation metro station lots shops restaurants local flavours shower 2x2 im 6 ft 220 lbs difficult maneuver leak bathroom entire time wrapped towel pipe call woke puddle floor morning power 5 times 5 days breakfast okay seat selection croissants cheeses fresh coffee opted eat mornings cheaper sandwich local bakery didnt knowledgeable answering tourist questions lot flyers foyer youre budget fussy youre person hotel serve purpose

Reviews.Title: “Fancy Paris hotel and good value”
Reviews.Author: Rémy N
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights lux hotel location fun paris near central station rer metro nation helpfull staff cozy clean fancy price reasonable nice hotel inside paris

Reviews.Title: “Quiet and great value”
Reviews.Author: pony1127
Reviews.Content: stayed nights friend lux hotel cause located quiet comfortable night sleep breakfast provided hotel nice smiled time ill definitely

Reviews.Title: “Very nice and cheap hotel, metro across the street in a nice neigbourhood”
Reviews.Author: snuddie
Reviews.Content: hotel lies perfect takes 1 minute metro street bought metrocard lasted week cost 70 euro persons travel paris bus train metro disneyland hotel cheap 36 euro 2 persons 1 week nice staff didnt tried bathroom nice hairdryer recommend own nice neigbourhood traffic noise night little fridge minibar perfect buy own water cold persons recomend

Reviews.Title: “A REAL European Hotel”
Reviews.Author: EIEIOOO
Reviews.Content: stayed lux hotel 7 nights june wife adult daughter clean staff warm neighborhood french tourist destination loved trouble finding affordable hotel 3 paris found lux glad wife bed home breakfast served 10 metro close rer street real parisian experience stay american hotel stay home saturday market vincennes street paris stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value and Comfort”
Reviews.Author: FocusedGeezer
Reviews.Content: hotel clean comfortable represented extraordinary value located close picpus metro station hasan elevator 24 hour reception available refrigerators televisions telephones serviced daily breakfasts excellent variety foods intend lodging future trips paris recommended numerous friends

HotelInfo.Name: Lux Hotel Picpus
HotelInfo.Address: 74, boulevard de Picpus, 75012 Paris, France
